questions.questionTitle: Q2 - Take the third road on the left

answers.answerTitle: The speaker is talking in general terms
The speaker is giving instructions to get somewhere

questions.questionTitle: Q3 - I don't like tea with sugar

answers.answerTitle: The speaker is talking about now
The speaker is talking in general terms

questions.questionTitle: Q4 - Manchester United are winning two-zero

answers.answerTitle: This refers to an unfinished game

questions.questionTitle: Q5 - I don't drive

answers.answerTitle: The speaker is in a car at the moment
The speaker either does not know how to drive or chooses not to drive

questions.questionTitle: Q6 - She's losing weight

answers.answerTitle: She often goes on a diet
She's on a diet at the moment

questions.questionTitle: Q7 - Do you buy a lot of CDs?

answers.answerTitle: The speaker wants to know if the person is in the habit of buying a lot of CDs
The speaker is probably in a record shop and wants to know how many CDs the other person has got in their bag

questions.questionTitle: Q8 - I'm leaving for Amsterdam on the last flight

answers.answerTitle: The speaker has not planned to travel
The speaker has planned to travel

questions.questionTitle: Q9 - Have you got any free time when we could talk?

answers.answerTitle: The speaker needs to speak to the other person now
The speaker has to speak to the other person on a number of occasions

questions.questionTitle: Q10 - I take milk in coffee

answers.answerTitle: The speaker only wants milk in a cup of coffee now
The speaker usually or always takes milk in coffee

questions.questionTitle: Q11 - I like the film

answers.answerTitle: The speaker can only be talking in general terms about liking film
The speaker could be talking in general terms or about a film she is watching now

questions.questionTitle: Q12 - I have breakfast at a quarter past seven
Q13 - She's having a child

answers.answerTitle: She is either pregnant or giving birth at the moment

questions.questionTitle: Q14 - John's waiting for you in reception

answers.answerTitle: The speaker knows that John often waits there
The speaker knows where John is now

questions.questionTitle: Q15 - She's got two daughters

answers.answerTitle: This sentence describes the action of giving birth to two daughters
This sentence describes her possessing two daughters

questions.questionTitle: Q16 - She's always blowing her nose

answers.answerTitle: The speaker is expressing dislike of her behaviour
The speaker doesn't object to her behaviour

questions.questionTitle: Q17 - I don't understand

answers.answerTitle: The person is talking in general terms and not about now
The person could be talking about now or in general terms

questions.questionTitle: Q18 - My neighbours are always playing their music too loud

answers.answerTitle: The speaker is talking about the music they are playing now
The speaker is talking about their usual music volume

questions.questionTitle: Q19 - She lives in a small village

answers.answerTitle: She is not going to move home in the near future
Her home is probably only for a short time
